text:
Edify Technologies | Denver, CO | Full-time

We're hiring a Director of Growth and Marketing: http://www.edify.co/marketer

We're a pre-seed Techstars Boulder 2015 company that makes music education apps for kids. If you're passionate about music/education/games or simply get excited about the challenges of a multi-faceted customer market (kids/parents), then reach out to us!
